# Autogenerated from MultiSource/Benchmarks/Olden/tsp/Makefile

set(DIRS)
set(PARALLEL_DIRS)

set(LEVEL ../../../..)
set(PROG tsp)
set(CPPFLAGS -DTORONTO)
set(LDFLAGS -lm)
if(DEFINED LARGE_PROBLEM_SIZE)
  set(RUN_OPTIONS 2048000)
else()
  if(DEFINED SMALL_PROBLEM_SIZE)
    set(RUN_OPTIONS 102400)
  else()
    set(RUN_OPTIONS 1024000)
    if("${ARCH}" STREQUAL "XCore")
      set(XCORE_TARGET_NEEDS_MEMORY 64)
    endif()
  endif()
endif()
llvm_multisource()

llvm_add_subdirectories(${DIRS} ${PARALLEL_DIRS})
